articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Challenge to Public Mind-set under Fire
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Challenge to Public Mind-set under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye during over 20-hours' long questioning by the prosecution totally denied her hideous crimes, on Mar. 21, consistently asserting that "she did not remember everything" and "she recognized facts but she had never instructed illegal acts." 
					 A spokesman of the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation said in a statement on Mar. 25 in this regard: 
					
					 Her behavior at the prosecution betrayed her disgraceful nature as the most evil woman in the world in craftiness and shamelessness and the true colors of a viper spurting out poison till it dies.
					
					 She talked about "truth" in tacit denial of hideous crimes. This is the height of impudence and an unpardonable mockery of the mind-set of the participants in the candlelight actions and a challenge to them.
					
					 The situation goes to clearly prove that not the slightest mercy and leniency but merciless iron hammer blow should be dealt at such brutes as the worst traitor Park.
					
					 No matter what shameless gimmicks she may employ to flout the mind-set of the participants in the candlelight actions, she will face stronger resistance of the infuriated public.
					
					 She had better admit all her thrice-cursed crimes, though belatedly, and opt to go to prison by herself.
					
					 The die-hard confidants including "pro-Park eight mandarins" who played the role of "guards" for her more dead than alive and the group of hired defense counsel should face severe judgment by the public and should be buried in the cemetery of history together with her.
					
					 Park's rash act of challenging the just public mind-set would only precipitate her miserable doom.

articles.title: 68th Anniversary of National Peace Committee of Korea Observed
articles.content:
68th Anniversary of National Peace Committee of Korea Observed 
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Pyongyang on March 24 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the National Peace Committee of Korea (NPCK).
					 Present at the meeting were members of the NPCK Standing Committee, Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea, Afro-Asian Solidarity Committee of Korea and the Korean Anti-War Peace Physicians, officials of various social organizations including the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and Socialist Women's Union of Korea, citizens and guests of honor.
					
					 A report and speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter and speakers recalled brisk activities the NPCK has conducted over the last years to ease tensions in the Korean Peninsula, achieve the reunification of the country and defend peace and stability in the Northeast Asian region and the rest of the world.
					
					 They said that the struggle of the Korean people for achieving the country's reunification and peace faces with grave provocations due to the vicious moves of the hostile forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 They stressed that the U.S. and south Korean puppet group are staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, reckless nuclear war drills targeting the DPRK, so as to drive the situation on the peninsula into the worst state.
					
					 They called upon the world progressives, international democratic organizations, committees for supporting the reunification of Korea and solidarity organizations valuing independence, justice and peace to strongly reject the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and take active part in the struggle for ensuring peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and the world and achieving the co-prosperity of mankind.
					
					 After the meeting, the participants looked round photos showing the activities of the NPCK.

articles.title: Congolese Gov't Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Congolese Gov't Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A Congolese government delegation led by Jacqueline Lydia Mikolo, minister of Health and Population, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Saturday.
					 The guests paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace in profound reverence for them.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display, and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 The head of the delegation wrote in the visitor's book that she was deeply impressed to visit the palace with reverence, adding that  the Korean people would creditably carry forward the cause of the great leaders at all times.

articles.title: Congolese Government Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Congolese Government Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A Congolese government delegation led by Minister of Health and Population Jacqueline Lydia Mikolo visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the old home in Mangyongdae where the President was born and spent his childhood, cultivating high ambition for the revolution, the guests looked round the historic relics.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Kyongsang Kindergarten, the Okryu Children's Hospital and the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.

articles.title: National Reunification Institute Exposes True Nature of S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
National Reunification Institute Exposes True Nature of S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute of the DPRK issued a white paper Saturday disclosing the despicable true nature of the south Korean puppet army, a group that has become more corrupt and undisciplined under the rule of traitor Park Geun Hye.
					 Jeering at the south Korean puppet army as a scare-crow army caught by war-weariness, the white paper says:
					
					 According to information revealed by the puppet National Assembly, the number of soldiers, who were discharged due to proclivity to evasion of military service and aversion to it developing into mental diseases, stood at over 15,000 in 2016 alone, five times as many as the figure under the Lee Myung Bak regime as a whole. Every year an average of 3,400 young people seek foreign nationalities for the evasion of military service.
					
					 73 percent of middle- and low-ranking military officers and 85 percent of non-commissioned officers have the tendency to evade service and over 85,000 soldiers request discharges from service, complaining of melancholy and other mental troubles, according to data minimized by the puppet military.
					
					 Branding the south Korean army as a group of undisciplined men resembling the corrupt "yusin" prostitute, the white paper goes on:
					
					 When the puppet defence ministry ordered "contingency" in February 2013, more than 240 military bosses including the air chief of staff and the navy chief of staff were dined and wined in a back parlor and played golf, after sending their soldiers to the first line, which sparked off a social uproar.
					
					 An average of one suicide in three days is reported in the army and those who were confirmed not to be appropriate for service doubled as before. A total of 49,300 soldiers are classified to belong to soldiers of "concern and danger" as they are judged to be capable of committing such crimes as opening fire into superiors and colleagues with the development of symptom of mental derangement attributable to harsh exercises and physical torture.
					
					 The south Korean puppet army is a huge Mafia group trained by the "yusin" descendent.
					
					 With the traits of making money through the supply of cheap and poorly-made munitions to military units after being bribed by munitions businesses prevalent among generals of the army, 70 percent of those above lieutenant general gained $700,000 worth property each and eight generals embezzled over one million U.S. dollars each in 2013 alone.
					
					 Scandal is most serious in the field of munitions industry.
					
					 Military-turned munitions businessmen form a network among themselves to be called military mafia.
					
					 South Korea has turned into a scrapped U.S. weaponry exhibition and the military into a concentration camp without bars and an approved theatre of human rights abuses.
					
					 Such military warmongers as puppet Defence Minister Han Min Gu still incite war fever, recklessly crying out for "punishment" and "readiness for war", far from drawing a lesson from the miserable end of traitor Park Geun Hye who was severely punished by the public for her hideous provocations and north-targeted war exercises.
					
					 Should a war break out, the arms of the soldiers of the puppet army will be aimed at the corrupt and incompetent Park Geun Hye group of traitors including Han Min Gu before anyone else.

articles.title: Magazine Korean Architecture
articles.content:
Magazine Korean Architecture
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Industrial Publishing House in the DPRK has recently published the 100th issue of magazine Korean Architecture.
					 The successful publication of the magazine would have been unthinkable without the wise leadership of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il saw to it that the magazine was published, and gave detailed guidance to its editing and publication.
					
					 Under his guidance, the first issue was brought out, drawing attention of experts at home and abroad.
					
					 Its readers greatly admired the development of Korean architecture attaining the world level under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 The magazine edits monumental edifices built in the country on the initiative of the Workers' Party of Korea and diverse data on architectural composition and sci-tech information for improving the creative skill and professional qualifications of architects.
					
					 Thanks to the energetic guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the DPRK is enjoying the great heyday of construction in the new century of Juche.

articles.title: Ryomyong Street Verging on Completion
articles.content:
Ryomyong Street Verging on Completion
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The construction of Ryomyong Street in the DPRK is on the verge of completion.
					The project includes the construction of 44 skyscrapers, high-rises and multi-storied apartment houses for over 4,000 families and 40-odd public buildings like nursery and kindergarten and the remodeling of more than 70 apartment buildings and public buildings in 90 hectares of area, which doubles the work carried out during the construction of Mirae Scientists Street.
					
					 Within 20 days after the start of the construction in April last year, servicepersons and builders removed tens of old buildings and hundreds of thousands of cubic meters of debris and finished excavation for ground concrete tamping.
					
					 From late May, frameworks of apartment buildings were completed one after another in different places of the construction site. In particular, the 70-storied skyscraper was framed in 74 days.
					
					 As of early September, the interior and exterior plastering reached over 95 percent throughout the construction site, while fast progress was made in remodeling and repairing apartment houses and public buildings and constructing infrastructure.
					
					 Though the construction was temporarily interrupted due to the rehabilitation in the flood-hit areas of North Hamgyong Province, the street took its shape thanks to the indefatigable efforts of builders.
					
					Soldier-builders completed the project for tiling outer wall of the 70-storied skyscraper covering over 43,000 square meters within 13 days.
					
					 All the achievements made in less than one year are attributable to the devoted efforts of servicepersons and builders who have pushed forward the construction at Mallima speed with the spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un visited the construction site again some days ago and said that all the proud successes achieved in the construction of Ryomyong Street are the precious fruits of strenuous attacking spirit and infinite mental power of the DPRK army and people who make an inveterate habit of carrying out the tasks given by the party at the time fixed by it and at the level required by it.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses Japan of Its Persecution Mania
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses Japan of Its Persecution Mania
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Japan is making much fuss after hearing the news that Hwasong artillery units of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army staged a ballistic rocket launching drill on March 6.
					 The Japanese authorities do not conceal their uneasiness about the fact that the U.S. bases in Japan are well within the DPRK's striking range of ballistic rockets and are going busy taking countermeasures.
					
					 High-ranking authorities, including the prime minister, the foreign minister and the defence minister, vied with each other to make shrill cry that "it is a threat on a new stage" and "it is crucial for the international community to take counteractions." They are making haste with the examination of THAAD deployment while stepping up the moves for the deployment of the system for intercepting missiles at the maximum altitude of 1,500 km.
					
					 There was citizens' evacuation drill, the first of its kind since World War II, in Akita Prefecture on March 17 under the simulated conditions of the DPRK's ballistic missile launch.
					
					 Spreading in the Japanese society is the assertion that the sphere of military activities of the Self-Defence Forces should be extended in the light of the extreme danger that no one can predict which might be flown from the DPRK.
					
					 This is just like a burnt child dreading the fire.
					
					 The DPRK does not hide the fact that the ballistic rocket launching drill was conducted to target the bases of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in Japan in contingency as it was the one to cope with the U.S.-led aggressors' nuclear war rehearsals against the former.
					
					 It is because of guilty conscience that Japan is making such fuss about the drill conducted by the DPRK as the latter has never fired a single bullet at territories of other countries beyond its territorial waters for self-defense.
					
					 The DPRK does not forget the fact that Japan was reduced to rear and logistic bases of the U.S. forces when they ignited the Korean War in the 1950s.
					
					 The then U.S. Ambassador to Japan Murphy said that Japan turned into a great logistic base at a marvelous speed, adding that if Japan had not done so, the U.S. would have been unable to fight the Korean war.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries remain unchanged in their ambition and strategic goal to launch reinvasion with the DPRK as their stepping-stone backed by the U.S.
					
					 The ruling quarters of Japan are offering their land as a logistic base of the U.S. forces in zealous pursuance of the U.S. strategy to dominate Asia-Pacific.
					
					 Timed to coincide with the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, the largest-ever U.S.-south Korea joint military drills for nuclear war against the DPRK being staged on the Korean peninsula, Japan launched a spy satellite against the DPRK and staged joint naval maneuvers with the U.S.
					
					 Japan had better stop acting rashly.
					
					 If the SDF launches reinvasion together with the U.S. aggressor forces, it will certainly meet setbacks.
					
					 The war maniacs are disturbing peace on the Korean peninsula and stability in the region and leading the situation to the brink of a nuclear war. Should they fire even a single shell into the inviolable territory of the DPRK, Japan will not escape fatal disaster.
					
					 Japan had better not invite constant disaster by recklessly toeing the U.S. line and escalating its moves against the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Talk about "Human Rights"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Talk about "Human Rights" 
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Days ago the U.S. took issue with various countries over human rights issues, behaving like a human rights judge though nobody recognizes it, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The international community has never given the U.S. the right to criticize or admonish other countries, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. much touted "human rights" is nothing but a method of openly interfering in internal affairs of other countries to effect regime change or bring down social systems there.
					
					 The U.S. labels those countries courting its displeasure as human rights abusers and malignantly defile their policies and social systems. It creates conditions for undesirable forces' legitimate maneuvers and, at the same time, woos them overtly and covertly into sparking off riots and civil wars by providing them with funds and weapons.
					
					 The U.S. talk about "human rights" is no more than a subterfuge to justify its armed intervention and aggression against other countries.
					
					 The spearhead of the U.S. imperialists' "human rights" campaign is directed to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is prodding its vassal forces into adopting "resolutions on human rights" against the DPRK in the UN arena in a desperate bid to bring down dignified Korean-style socialism.
					
					 This is a shameless political chicanery intended to trample down justice by injustice and falsify truth with lies and it is the American-style evil doctrine of making profound confusion of the progressive and the reactionary.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can shake the revolutionary faith and firm will of the Korean people and bring down Korean-style socialism with their mean talk about "human rights".

articles.title: Victory of Korean-style Socialism Is Science: Rodong Sinmun and Kulloja
articles.content:
Victory of Korean-style Socialism Is Science: Rodong Sinmun and Kulloja
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun and Kulloja in a joint article say that socialism in the DPRK remains ever-victorious as it has tremendous might on the firm scientific basis, holding the peerlessly great men in high esteem.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 It is the necessity, science and truth of history that Korean-style socialism is sure to triumph.
					
					 Korean-style socialism is the one centered on the popular masses which embodies the Juche-oriented outlook on the people and people's philosophy.
					
					 The best weapon guaranteeing the solidity, advantages and invincibility of socialism is the single-minded unity of the Party and revolutionary ranks.
					
					 The tremendous military power and self-development with single-minded unity and nuclear armed force as their pivot are the three mainstays for protecting socialism.
					
					 The great Party's leadership is a decisive factor of guaranteeing the victory of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 The scientific accuracy, truth and invincibility of Korean-style socialism are demonstrated on the highest level as the army and people have respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un at the helm of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, our Party has fully demonstrated its might as the general staff of the Korean revolution and the militancy of the revolutionary ranks has remarkably grown stronger.
					
					 Korean-style socialism is giving full play to its advantages and vitality on the scientific basis and displaying its tremendous might thanks to the great politics of our Party which prioritizes, respects and loves the people.
					
					 Steadfast is the faith of the Korean people in the victory of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 There may be power capable of breaking the earth, but no force on the earth which can shake the faith of Juche-oriented socialism firmly etched in the minds of all service personnel and people.
					
					 Unshakable are the faith and will of the Korean people to firmly protect the collective life and the true nature of socialism consolidated and developed while living in the large family of socialism generation after generation.
					
					 Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses is invincible as long as there are the great idea, the leadership of the great party and the great people who regard socialism as their life and soul.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Conservative Group's Moves to Prolong Their Regime
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Conservative Group's Moves to Prolong Their Regime
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- As May 9 was set as the date of the snap "presidential" election, greedy power seekers of the ultra-rightist conservative camp are making last-ditch efforts to turn the unfavorable political situation in their favor in a foolish bid to stay in power. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The puppet conservative forces leave no stone unturned in their moves to prolong the remaining days of their treacherous regime without an iota of guilty conscience, sparking off bitter anger among people from all walks of life.
					
					 It was quite natural that Park Geun Hye was removed from office owing to the massive struggle of the people because she committed countless thrice-cursed crimes since she took office. 
					
					 It is the mindset of the participants in the candlelight actions in south Korea that such worst traitor as Park should not be allowed to come to power again.
					
					 The conservative group's moves to prolong the remaining days of the regime are a blatant challenge to the south Korean people's desire for new politics and new life.
					
					 As demanded by the south Korean people from all walks of life, it is the accomplices of Park who should face punishment in the wake of her impeachment.
					
					 She mercilessly trampled down democracy and human rights and brought the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse. These crimes would be unthinkable without the hooliganism perpetrated by the "Liberal Korea Party" and "Parun Party", ferocious fascist and confrontation maniacs. 
					
					 No matter what sleight of hand the puppet conservative group may employ to win public mind-set, they can never cover up their despicable true colors and escape from their miserable defeat in the upcoming "presidential" election.

articles.title: Erection of Mini-Statues of Girl Sexual Slave Brisk at S. Korean High Schools
articles.content:
Erection of Mini-Statues of Girl Sexual Slave Brisk at S. Korean High Schools
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A movement of erecting mini-statues depicting a girl sexual slave is getting brisk among 100 high schools in south Korea.
					 Since the movement was launched by the Ehwa Women's High School last year, statues have been reportedly erected at 32 other high schools until January this year.
					
					 The statue was erected at Sangmu High School on Wednesday as the second one in Kwangju. The first one was erected at Songdok High School last year.

articles.title: Former Co-Representative of Korea Solidarity Sentenced to Jail Term in S. Korea
articles.content:
Former Co-Representative of Korea Solidarity Sentenced to Jail Term in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The puppet Seoul Central District Court on Mar. 23 sentenced the former co-representative of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy to one year and six months in prison on charge of violation of the "Security Law", according to the south Korean Newsis.
					 From 2015, the co-representative has praised the DPRK and called for withdrawal of the U.S. troops from south Korea and reunification of the country through federal formula.
					
					 He also contended that only massive resistance against fascism could bring down the reactionary puppet regime and build a true society where the popular masses have become a master.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Kicks off Watch on Introduction of THAAD and Test of Anthrax Germs
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Kicks off Watch on Introduction of THAAD and Test of Anthrax Germs
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Phyongtaek Citizens Action against THAAD and Anthrax Germs held a press conference outside the Osan U.S. air-force base in Phyongtaek City of south Korea on Mar. 20 at which it declared the kick-off of watch on the introduction of THAAD equipment and test of anthrax germs.
					 Speakers at the conference accused the U.S. and the south Korean authorities of announcing their plan to continue the introduction of anthrax germs and relevant drill after their illegal shipment into the Osan U.S. air-force base in 2015 and stressed the need to watch it.
					
					 From that day, the members of the organization decided to start the watch on the environment in the U.S. forces base and make public its results.

articles.title: Communist Party of Soviet Union to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Communist Party of Soviet Union to Mark Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A joint committee involving representatives of political parties and organizations under the Communist Party of the Soviet Union was formed on March 16 to celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The joint committee chaired by Mojgovoy, first secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the Soviet Union and chairman of the International Social Federation "For the Union and Union's Communist Party", is composed of representatives of the Communist Workers Party of Russia, the Communist Party of Kyrgyzstan, the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, the Communist Party of Azerbaijan, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and other parties and organizations.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Sofia on March 17.
					 Mincho Minchev, chairman of the Bulgarian Communists' Party and chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events including a meeting and seminar on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Vocero de CNCDP advierte a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Vocero de CNCDP advierte a EE.UU. 
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) hizo publica el dia 24 la declaracion intitulada "Estados Unidos debe actuar con prudencia meditando las consecuencias catastroficas que engendrara su intento de golpe preventivo.
					El vocero menciono que la nueva administracion norteamericana, que hablaba de que estaban revisando los proyectos de la politica sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en todos los dominios como politica, asuntos militares, diplomacia, economia, etc., esta divulgando en estos dias el rumor de que se excluyo el proyecto de ataque preventivo contra la RPDC.
					
					Esto deviene una artimana enganosa para apaciguar la opinion publica del interior y exterior sobre el extremado proyecto sobre la RPDC, suavizar la cada dia mas exaltada disposicion de reaccion superintransigente de la RPDC, y llevar a la practica el ataque preventivo, revelo el vocero y prosiguio:
					
					Para nueva administracion norteamericana seria mejor prestar oidos a las voces de su propia casa que preocupan de las consecuencias catastroficas del ataque preventivo, y tomar una opcion  correcta a fin de evitar el destino tragico.
					
					EE.UU. debe cesar ahora mismo los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC y retirar todos los medios de ataque preventivo introducidos en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno.
					
					Si EE.UU. muestra un minimo movimiento de dar un ataque preventivo a la RPDC, los fuertes medios de ataque nuclear coreanos eliminaran todos los nidos de agresion y provocacion mediante el golpe ofensivo y preventivo al estilo coreano.
					
					EE.UU. debe meditar bien las consecuencias catastroficas que se emanara de su intento de ataque preventivo y actuar con prudencia.

articles.title: Portavoz de CRN denuncia procedimiento desafiante de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz de CRN denuncia procedimiento desafiante de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- La traidora Park Geun-hye, citada por la fiscalia en calidad de acusada nego totalmente en la investigacion de mas de 20 horas sus crimenes de categoria especial diciendo invariablemente que "no tiene en la memoria todas las cosas" y "reconoce los hechos, pero no ordeno ninguna vez los actos ilegales".
					  A traves de la presente investigacion de la fiscalia titere, ella revelo a todo el mundo su caracter astuto y descarado de la diabla sin igual en el mundo y su naturaleza vil de la vibora recalcitrante.
					
					  Asi condena el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional en su declaracion publicada el dia 25 y continua:
					
					  La traidora Park niega persistentemente sus archi-crimenes hablando de la supuesta "verdad", lo que deviene el climax del descaro y la burla y desafio intolerables a la opinion publica expresada en la lucha con velas.
					
					  La realidad demuestra claramente que a la barbara como la traidora Park le merece solo el golpe implacable.
					
					  Cuanto mas Park se vale de todas las artimanas burlando la opinion publica, tanto mas tropezara con la mas gran resistencia de la poblacion surcoreana indignada.
					
					  Esa traidora debe reconocer todos sus crimenes vergonzosos, aunque sea ahora, y optar voluntariamente por el castigo de prision.
					
					  Ademas, los lacayos como los "8 mandarines pro-Park" que cumplian el papel de escoltas de Park Geun-hye, ya convertida en cadaver politico, y el panel de abogados mercenarios tambien deben ser sentenciados severamente por la opinion popular y enterrados en la tumba de la historia junto con ella.
					
					  La imprudencia desafiante de la traidora Park acelerara solo su fin tragico.

articles.title: Gobierno de la RPDC ofrece banquete en honor de delegacion congolena
articles.content:
Gobierno de la RPDC ofrece banquete en honor de delegacion congolena
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio este viernes un banquete en honor de la delegacion del gobierno de la Republica del Congo.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los integrantes de la delegacion encabezada por la ministra de Salud Publica y Poblacion, Jacqueline Lydia Mikolo.
					
					Se distinguian tambien el ministro de Salud Publica Kang Ha Guk y los funcionarios interesados.

articles.title: IRP revela situacion actual del ejercito titere surcoreano
articles.content:
IRP revela situacion actual del ejercito titere surcoreano
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria hizo publica el dia 25 una carta blanca que pone al desnudo la situacion actual del ejercito titere surcoreano, soldadesca corrompida aun mas debido a la traidora Park Geun-hye. 
					Este cuerpo armado esta colmado del pesimismo de la guerra, adelanta el documento y prosigue:
					
					Segun los datos publicados por la "Asamblea Nacional" del Sur de Corea, se hace un sintoma de enfermedad psiquica entre los uniformados surcoreanos la evasion y la aversion al servicio militar y el numero de los soldados licenciados por problemas de salud llego en el ano pasado a mas de 15 mil, el quintuplo en comparacion con la cifra acumulada en todo el mandato de Lee Myung Bak. Anualmente, mas de 3 mil 400 jovenes como promedio anual adquieren la nacionalidad extranjera para evadir el servicio militar. 
					
					Segun las estadisticas publicadas por el circulo militar surcoreano reduciendo cifras de verdad, el 73% de los oficiales de la capa mediana y la baja y el 85% de suboficiales tienen la tendencia a evadir el servicio militar. Actualmente, sobrepasa 85 mil el numero de los que solicitan la licencia quejandose de melancolia y otras enfermedades mentales. 
					
					El ejercito titere surcoreano es la soldadesca parecida a Park Geun-hye, degenerada descendiente del dictador de Yusin (renovacion). 
					
					Cuando el Ministerio de Defensa dio la orden de entrar en el "estado de emergencia" en febrero de 2013, mas de 240 figuras de la cupula militar, inclusive los jefes del Estado Mayor de las Fuerzas Aereas y del Estado Mayor de la Marina, empujaron a la linea avanzada y disfrutaron banquetes opiparos ofrecidos a puertas cerradas y jugaban el golf, hecho que causo un revuelo social. 
					
					En las filas del ejercito surcoreano surge un suicida a cada 3 dias como promedio y se duplico el numero de los calificados como inaptos para servir en el ejercito. 
					
					Llega a 49 mil 300 el numero de los soldados clasificados como "los bajo el cuidado y los peligrosos" que muestran senales de trastorno mental debido a los ejercicios y castigos salvajes y pueden cometer crimenes contra sus superiores y colegas como el uso de armas de fuego.
					
					El ejercito titere surcoreano es la horda de mafias formada por la descendiente del dictador de "Yusin". 
					
					Los generales obtienen fabulosas ganancias con el metodo de suministrar pertrechos baratos y defectuosos a las unidades a cambio del dinero que les pagan los complejos de industria belica. A citar un ejemplo, solo en el ano 2013, el 70% de los generales superiores al grado de teniente general acumulo cada uno los bienes valorados en mas de 700 mil US$ mientras 8 magnates del nivel de general de ejercito desfalcaron mas de un millon de US$. 
					
					La industria belica es el sector donde se reportan los casos mas graves de corrupcion e irregularidades. 
					
					Ahora, los funcionarios de origen militar, que ocupan cargos importantes de la industria belica del Sur de Corea, se ganaron el apodo de "mafias militares" porque estan vinculados estrechamente para las practicas de corrupcion. 
					
					En la actualidad, el Sur de Corea se convierte en el mercado de armamentos chatarreados de fabricacion norteamericana y el ejercito titere surcoreano es repudiado como prision sin rejas y violador autorizado de derechos humanos. 
					
					Los belicistas del circulo militar como el ministro de Defensa Han Min Gu infunden hasta en este momento el clima de guerra diciendo disparates imprudentes como "represalia" y "no vacilar en desatar la guerra", lejos de sacar la leccion del fin tragico de la traidora Park Geun-hye, condenada severamente por la poblacion por haber recurrido freneticamente a las graves provocaciones y los ejercicios belicos contra la RPDC. 
					
					En el caso de estallar la guerra, los soldados surcoreanos apuntaran primero a Han Min Gu y otros compinches de la banda corrupta de Park Geun-hye.

articles.title: ACNC comenta movimientos de Japon despues de entrenamiento de unidades artilleras Hwasong
articles.content:
ACNC comenta movimientos de Japon despues de entrenamiento de unidades artilleras Hwasong
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- Japon se mueve con inquietud despues del entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes balisticos de las unidades artilleras Hwasong de las fuerzas estrategicas del Ejercito Popular de Corea, realizado el pasado dia 6. 
					Las autoridades japonesas se dan prisa para preparar las contramedidas sintiendose intranquilas por la situacion de las bases militares norteamericanas en su pais en el alcance de cohete balistico de la RPDC. 
					
					El premier, el canciller, el ministro de Defensa y otras altas autoridades se quejan por turno diciendo que el "lanzamiento deviene otra amenaza de nueva etapa" y "se hace mas imperiosa la reaccion de la sociedad internacional". Tratan de adelantar la instalacion del sistema de defensa antimisiles capaz de interceptar en la altura maxima de 1500km y revisan la introduccion de THAAD.
					
					Por otra parte, tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el departamento de Akita el ejercicio de evacuacion de civiles por primera vez despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial suponiendo el lanzamiento de cohetes balisticos de la RPDC. 
					
					Se expande en la sociedad japonesa la opinion en favor de ampliar el teatro operacional de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa".
					
					No ocultamos que el reciente ensayo es para hacer frente a la campana de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC bajo el protagonismo de EE.UU. y tuvo por su objetivo atacar las bases militares norteamericanas en el pais isla en el tiempo de emergencia. 
					
					No olvidamos que durante la guerra coreana desatada en la decada de 1950 por EE.UU., todo el territorio japones se ha convertido en la base de retaguardia y logistica para las tropas norteamericanas. 
					
					El entonces embajador norteamericano en Japon dijo que "el archipielago japones se convirtio a una velocidad tremenda en un gran almacen de suministro. De no suceder eso, EE.UU. no habria podido hacer la guerra coreana". 
					
					Tomar el camino de reagresion con la ayuda de su amo norteamericano usando a Corea como trampolin es la invariable ambicion y el objetivo estrategico de los reaccionarios japoneses. 
					
					Por eso, los gobernantes japoneses entregan su territorio como base de logistica norteamericana adhiriendose a la estrategia de EE.UU. de dominar Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					Coincidiendo con los ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle de mayor envergadura en la Peninsula Coreana, Japon lanzo un satelite espia y libro junto con EE.UU. el entrenamiento naval conjunto. 
					
					Japon debe actuar con prudencia. 
					
					Si las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" intentan la nueva agresion junto con las tropas yanquis, Japon sufrira las consecuencias daninas. 
					
					Si los maniacos de guerra, que perturban la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la estabilidad regional y llevan la situacion al umbral de guerra nuclear, se atreven a lanzar una sola bala siquiera hacia nuestro territorio sagrado, Japon no podra evitar el desastre fatal. 
					
					A ese pais le convendria abandonar la imprudente sumision a EE.UU. y la campana anti-RPDC.
